description:
I made a WebGL version lol (I hope it works cause Unity WebGL sucks) Also for some goddamn reason webGL skips the intro scene so sorry

The groundwork for this game was laid by Beaoobeaoo as a joke. RGC Exists asked for the source code and turned it into... Still a joke, but playable. This is just the demo, but I'm not sure if I'll turn it into a full release. TRAILER BEAOOBEAOO'S ORIGINAL VIDEO
